entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Courtenay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:15 a.m. PDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Comox Airport 8:00 AM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain

Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 19 km
Humidity: 81 %

Wind: SSE 33 km/h gust 46 km/h

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 20 mm except 30 mm inland. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this morning. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming south 20 after midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023
